data.name: 0000 (369.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Wh-what's with you guys? I thought your business with us was over?

data.name: 0001 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As soon as we entered the room, the president was already trying to shut us out.

data.name: 0002 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Well, not that I can blame him—Haruhi is known to cause trouble.

data.name: 0003 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Come now, don't we share a neighborly bond?

data.name: 0004 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi swiftly pushed back against the door and entered the room with his refreshing smile.

data.name: 0005 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even a seasoned salesman wouldn't be able to make such a magnificent entrance.

data.name: 0008 (369.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Th-thus begins our misfortune. You guys cause nothing but trouble!

data.name: 0009 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I'd like to make it very clear that Haruhi is the only one causing trouble.

data.name: 0010 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We just want to ask for more details about the fabled class 1-10 or whatever it's called.

data.name: 0011 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We need proof that it's nonsense so we can get Haruhi to quit chasing this ghost story…

data.name: 0012 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …because horrors on a greater scale than the seven wonders of our school lie in wait.

data.name: 0013 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: World destruction or alteration—that kind of thing might actually be possible…

data.name: 0014 (369.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: W-we've already told your leader everything.

data.name: 0015 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We think you may have left out a few things—unintentionally, of course.

data.name: 0016 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: People don't just hand out their recollections to those they feel uncomfortable with.

data.name: 0017 (369.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Data is required. Preferably as detailed as possible.

data.name: 0018 (369.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: E-even if you say that…

data.name: 0019 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi approaching with his refreshing smile, and Nagato stoically demanding information—

data.name: 0020 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Between these two, the president was served a different flavor of intimidation than Haruhi's.

data.name: 0021 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: This atmosphere... It's as if they're leading him to confess to some non-existent murder.

data.name: 0022 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: If you guys put too much pressure on him, he won't be able to remember anything.

data.name: 0024 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well, there's certainly truth in that.

data.name: 0025 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's each take turns to make sure we get everything he knows out of him.

data.name: 0026 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So—we'll start with…

data.name: 0028 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Let's have Nagato kick us off.

data.name: 0029 (369.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Understood. Who is the witness?

data.name: 0030 (369.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: …Fine then. Let's just make sure this is the last time, okay?

data.name: 0031 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No promises, but we'll do the best we can.

data.name: 0033 (369.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: You—answer their questions quickly so we can get them out of here.

data.name: 0034 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The president called out to one of the club members.

data.name: 0035 (369.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: We're in the middle of a very delicate and sensitive operation.

data.name: 0036 (369.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: We can't keep getting interrupted like this— actually, we're already behind schedule…

data.name: 0038 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Now that he's not the target of the questioning, he seems much more carefree.

data.name: 0039 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I won't forget about his complaining though.

data.name: 0040 (369.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Hearsay? Direct experience?

data.name: 0041 (369.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Ah… I actually experienced it myself.

data.name: 0042 (369.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Alone? Group?

data.name: 0043 (369.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Umm, I was alone…

data.name: 0044 (369.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: List all evidence that led to the conclusion of class 10's existence.

data.name: 0045 (369.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Huh…? L-list it?

data.name: 0046 (369.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I assume there are criteria by which you recognized it as class 1-10.

data.name: 0047 (369.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Y-yes—the plate said 1-10.

data.name: 0048 (369.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Be specific.

data.name: 0049 (369.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: S-specific?

data.name: 0050 (369.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Not visual information—attribute changes or the effects of other physical phenomena.

data.name: 0051 (369.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: H-huuh?!

data.name: 0052 (369.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: For example, were there fluctuations in mass? Did the time oscillation hold a normal value?

data.name: 0053 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: As you'd expect, I have no idea what's with these questions.

data.name: 0054 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: For the time being, could you at least try and tell us about it in more detail?

data.name: 0055 (369.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: R-right…

data.name: 0056 (369.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: U-umm, there was this feeling, and…

data.name: 0057 (369.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …What else?

data.name: 0058 (369.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Other than that, well, umm…

data.name: 0059 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Nagato's line of questioning continued.

data.name: 0060 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Occasionally she went quiet and motionlessly stared—it seemed to put pressure on him.

data.name: 0061 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He revealed that they decided to hold a summer camp to create an original game.

data.name: 0062 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He told us this completely unprompted, sending the president into a panic.

data.name: 0063 (369.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: Oooh… Please just give me a break already!

data.name: 0064 (369.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: I just mistook what I saw, okay? Please, no more!

data.name: 0065 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He ended up crying and denying everything.

data.name: 0067 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If Miss Suzumiya heard this and simply accepted it, the problem would be solved.

data.name: 0068 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Except it's Haruhi, so that's never going to work.

data.name: 0069 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though it would have been better if Haruhi were here to witness it for herself.

data.name: 0070 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Not that I'd expect her to just stand there and quietly watch.

data.name: 0073 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Koizumi—you're good at cross-examining, aren't you?

data.name: 0074 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Cross-examination? That's a remarkable way of putting it, though I won't deny your claim.

data.name: 0075 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: How dare you say that so shamelessly!

data.name: 0076 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: You want me to start questioning?

data.name: 0077 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Go for it.

data.name: 0078 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well then, how about we begin by discussing the objective of this summer camp?

data.name: 0079 (369.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: That's got nothing to do with the mystery, does it?

data.name: 0080 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Aren't you being hasty in deciding whether it's related or not?

data.name: 0081 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Disregarding whether or not you actually witnessed such a curiosity…

data.name: 0082 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: …I'd like to pin down the basic information, if you wouldn't mind.

data.name: 0083 (369.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: I don't have cause to tell outsiders like you— it's a Computer Society secret, you know?

data.name: 0084 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Oh my, so you have something you wish to hide, do you?

data.name: 0085 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Shall I take that to mean it would trouble you if we found out?

data.name: 0086 (369.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Th-that's not the case whatsoever!

data.name: 0087 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: So you want me to take your word for it without knowing the details… Ah, that's tricky.

data.name: 0088 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He's just spitting out these sinister lines with a smile on his face.

data.name: 0089 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I feel a little sorry for the club president—my bad for choosing Koizumi.

data.name: 0090 (369.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: …We're developing an original game for the school festival.

data.name: 0091 (369.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: I can't tell you any more about the game until it's finished and released.

data.name: 0092 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I understand. As follows, your group has been spending a long time staring at monitors.

data.name: 0093 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That would certainly make your eyes tired—perhaps even impair your vision.

data.name: 0094 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Incidentally, the witness was someone other than yourself, so who is that person?

data.name: 0096 (369.ja) CLUB_MEM_A (部員Ａ)
data.value: …It's me.

data.name: 0097 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Then would you mind running us through the whole event? Please recount all the details.

data.name: 0098 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi's questioning continued on and on.

data.name: 0101 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: By the time it was over, the whole computer society had been robbed of their vigor.

data.name: 0102 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even the ones who weren't questioned looked as if all the life had been siphoned out of them.

data.name: 0103 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It was a truly pitiful scene.

data.name: 0104 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even I'm somehow tired…

data.name: 0105 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It seems we've heard everything worth hearing.

data.name: 0106 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's because you bullied him down to his core. He won't be back on his feet for a while.

data.name: 0107 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Naturally, I can't help but feel sorry for them.

data.name: 0108 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Let's just head back to Haruhi for now.

data.name: 0109 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: But before that, maybe I should have a quick word with the other two…?

data.name: 0111 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So you didn't find anything significant... right?

data.name: 0112 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato—aren't you tired?

data.name: 0113 (369.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I'm fine.

data.name: 0114 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I guess that was a stupid question.

data.name: 0115 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Although, this alien-made organic android does eat and sleep.

data.name: 0116 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Actually, I've never confirmed that she sleeps, but—

data.name: 0117 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: What I'm trying to say is that everything I've seen her do so far seems human-like…

data.name: 0118 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: …could that all just be in my head?

data.name: 0119 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She might also just be acting tough after I showed concern for her.

data.name: 0120 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Don't overdo it, Nagato.

data.name: 0121 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Through thick and thin, in the end, you're always my last hope.

data.name: 0122 (369.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: …Understood.

data.name: 0123 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Koizumi, aren't you beat?

data.name: 0124 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Oh my, isn't that rare—having you direct your concern towards me.

data.name: 0125 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: The fact that you're being needlessly sar- castic tells me you've got plenty of energy.

data.name: 0126 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Truly a pity.

data.name: 0127 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I apologize for failing to live up to your expectations.

data.name: 0128 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Snide 'til the bitter end, this guy.

data.name: 0130 (369.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: I guess such a merciless brigade chief would have equally merciless subordinates…

data.name: 0131 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: He said something I couldn't ignore, but see- ing his condition, it was hard to argue back.

data.name: 0132 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Our reputation is getting worse and worse, and it seems too late to do anything about it.

data.name: 0133 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We thank you for your cooperation.

data.name: 0134 (369.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Don't let anyone know that we're making an original game.

data.name: 0135 (369.ja) CLUB_PRES (部長氏)
data.value: Especially Miss Brigade Chief.

data.name: 0136 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That's not an issue, of course. Fret not.

data.name: 0137 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That smile is so refreshing it's suspicious.

data.name: 0140 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: For some reason, I'm starting to feel bad for those computer society members.

data.name: 0141 (369.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Why?

data.name: 0142 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I feel as if we exhibited decorum in our questioning…

data.name: 0143 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: These two…

data.name: 0144 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Didn't you see how utterly spent they were? That was a bit excessive, right?

data.name: 0145 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We can't afford to go easy on them.

data.name: 0146 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: There's an outbreak of abnormal space in the school—it's likely worsening by the second.

data.name: 0147 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Until we stop Haruhi.

data.name: 0148 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: They planted the seed, so I personally don't have sympathy to spare.

data.name: 0149 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: …I suppose so. We have to quickly persuade Haruhi to leave the school grounds.

data.name: 0150 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: By the way, I chanced upon this earlier.

data.name: 0151 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Koizumi took out a memory card and showed me.

data.name: 0152 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Might I ask "where" you happened to chance upon it?

data.name: 0153 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Outside of the Computer Society club room. I think they must have dropped it.

data.name: 0154 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's pretty shady to say you "chanced upon it" if its just something they dropped.

data.name: 0155 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I believe it contains the data for the original game they're producing.

data.name: 0156 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I wonder if we could use it?

data.name: 0157 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: For what?

data.name: 0158 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: To draw Haruhi's attention away from the seven wonders, of course.

data.name: 0159 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Ah, so that's why this bastard's smile looked so suspicious.

data.name: 0160 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Man, you'll really do anything if it's for Haruhi's sake, huh, Koizumi?

data.name: 0161 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If it's for the sake of defending the world, I don't much care what others think of me.

data.name: 0162 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Give it back.

data.name: 0163 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'll return it if you so insist, but are you really sure about this?

data.name: 0164 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We can't play a game that's still mid- development. Haruhi would quickly get bored.

data.name: 0165 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Either way—it's important to them, isn't it?

data.name: 0166 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Well, I suppose you're right.

data.name: 0167 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Not to mention, it might be more beneficial to use it to earn a favor from them.

data.name: 0168 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: We have four mysteries. We might not be able to convince Haruhi with the first—class 1-10.

data.name: 0169 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If you say so…

data.name: 0170 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Alright, then it's settled.

data.name: 0171 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Well then, I guess I'd better go back and return this thing.

data.name: 0172 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Defending the world, huh? I hate that it's true.

data.name: 0173 (369.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Dissatisfied?

data.name: 0174 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Yeah I'm dissatisfied—not that there's anything I can do about it.

data.name: 0175 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I take issue with the fact that the safety of the world depends on Haruhi's mood.

data.name: 0176 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Even Koizumi—you can call it his job, but he's earnestly trying to protect the world.

data.name: 0177 (369.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: They got us into this mess, so I'll have them be the ones to pay for it.

data.name: 0178 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: They won't be able to make games anyways if the world ceases to exist.

data.name: 0179 (369.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Telling myself that, I decided to ignore the feelings of guilt for now.

data.name: 0180 (369.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Choose Nagato

data.name: 0181 (369.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Choose Koizumi

data.name: 0182 (369.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Talk to Nagato

data.name: 0183 (369.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Talk to Koizumi

data.name: 0184 (369.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Give it back.

data.name: 0185 (369.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: Defending the world, huh?
